Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I know you're there. I'm
coming in.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. You seemed busy today.
You must have been sad not to be able to
come talk to me.
<PAGE>
Today is Spring Harmony Day, right? I
brought you a gift in return for what
you gave me in winter. Let's eat.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. You look happy. Is it
because you got to talk with me?
<PAGE>
Today is Spring Harmony Day, right? I
brought you a gift in return for what
you gave me in winter. Let's eat.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Come on. Let's go to the table.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Did you give chocolates
to anyone besides me for Winter Harmony
Day?
<PAGE>
I'm your boyfriend. Don't give anyone
else chocolates. Don't try to make me
jealous.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good, right? Of course it is. I made it
myself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>What's with that face? You didn't think
I would? Sweets like these are no sweat
for someone like me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Isn't it nice once in a while? I made
it out of love for you. So you better
enjoy it.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>. You look cute when you're
eating, too.
<PAGE>
If I can watch that cute face every day,
it wouldn't be bad living together.
Well, that's if I felt like it.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You look satisfied. You feel yourself
smiling big?
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, thank you. I hope you'll
always be my lover.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, I'll be going now. Good night,
<MYNAME>. Sweet dreams.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I'm coming in! Excuse me!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. I'm so glad
you're home.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You know today is Spring Harmony Day?
I'm here to give you a gift for those
chocolates. Will you eat it with me?

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm so glad you're home. I don't know
what I would have done if you weren't.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You know today is Spring Harmony Day?
I'm here to give you a gift for those
chocolates. Will you eat it with me?

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Haha. Thanks, <MYNAME>. Let's eat up.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Your face says it all. You like it. 
That's a relief.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I've been thinking about what to give
you for the past two weeks. I racked
my brain so hard that it was exhausting.
<PAGE>
But it was kind of fun to think about
what to give you, <MYNAME>. That's
what's so amazing about love.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Hey, <MYNAME>. I really like you.
<PAGE>
It's embarrassing, so this is the only
time I can say it. But you always give
me so much.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I hope we'll always be together. Right,
my love?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You seem to be enjoying yourself. You're
happy because of my gift, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>That means you like me, and my alone,
right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh, no. I feel so happy, I think I might
get a nosebleed.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
By the way, did you make the sweets
you gave me for Winter Harmony Day? They
were so good.
<PAGE>
I think I want even more next year! Did
that sound a bit pushy and childish?
Anyway, don't let me down.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I think I'll go now. Good night,
<MYNAME>. See you tomorrow!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>! It's me! I'm coming in!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry to bother you this late at night.
But you know how it's Harmony Day. I
brought you a gift, so let's eat it.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry to bother you this late at night.
But you know how it's Harmony Day. I
brought you a gift.
<PAGE>
I could have given it to you earlier,
but I thought we could eat it together.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good. Glad to see you're so agreeable.
Anyway, let's dig in.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Haha, <MYNAME>. You have some of the
sweets stuck on your cheek.
<PAGE>
You don't have to rush. The sweets
aren't going anywhere. Just take your
time.
<PAGE>
Well, seeing how much you like them, I
guess it was worth the trouble.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I was thinking of making sweets for
Harmony Day, and I did try a few times.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Yeah, I failed in all attempts though.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'll try again next year so just wait
and see.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, that's right, <MYNAME>. The sweets
you gave me during winter were great.
They were just sweet enough.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Hmm? I guess you're right. Who would
know my preferences better than the love
of my life? Haha, that's nice to hear.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But the sweets you're eating right now
match your tastes, right? We're even 
now.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's just that being together like this
really drives home that we're dating.
<PAGE>
Say, <MYNAME>. Do you ever regret being
with me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Whoa, you're scary! You don't have to
glare at me like that. Sorry I even 
asked.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH><MYNAME>, I know that you would never
think that. I'm the happiest man in the
world.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'll be going home now. Good night,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening. It's me, Sanjay. Are you
here, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. You'll have to excuse
me for visiting so late.
<PAGE>
Today is Harmony Day, so I brought you
some sweets as a gift. If you'd like,
we can enjoy it together?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. You'll have to excuse
me for visiting so late.
<PAGE>
Today is Harmony Day, so I brought you
some sweets as a gift. If you'd like,
we can enjoy it together?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you. Now do you mind if I borrowed
your kitchen?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I made these sweets myself. How do they
taste?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Good? That's a relief. I'll make them
again next time, and I hope you'll 
accept them again then. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>If... If I made them every day, would
I get to see you every day?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'm sorry, I was just talking to myself.
Please ignore me.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I was very happy for the sweets you gave
me this past winter. Thank you very
much.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>After I finished them, feelings of
loneliness and happiness mixed together,
and I wanted to see you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Maybe that's why I am here today.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I made these sweets myself. It took
numerous tries, though.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE><MYNAME>, I thought of you as I made them
so that I could create the best sweets
possible.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I have a mountain of failed attempts,
though.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, I'm just glad I was able to
see you so happy.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This reminds me of the time we had tea
together, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I had mistaken you for coming to visit
my master. I brewed some tea for you to
apologize. Do you remember that?
<PAGE>
The smile you showed me then was just
so adorable. It gave me an unspeakable
amount of happiness inside.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>And right now, you are showing that same
smile. I feel so very happy now as well.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I should excuse myself now. I'm sure
your morning begins early. Please rest
up.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you here? I'm coming in.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You seem to be doing well. I'm here
today for something, actually.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Well, you know... Today is Harmony Day.
I brought you a gift... You want to
eat it together?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry to visit you so late. Well, it's
nothing big, but...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Well, you know... Today is Harmony Day.
I brought you a gift... You want to
eat it together?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh... Good. Let's eat.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, is it good? Oh, that's good to
hear. That's a relief.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Wait, no... I'm just not confident when
I pick these things. I didn't know if
you'd really like it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>No, nothing. I was just talking to
myself. Don't worry about it.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
By the way, the one you gave me for
Harmony Day tasted great. Thanks.
<PAGE>
I'm a picky eater, so you probably had
to go through a lot to make it the way
I liked it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>
So, well... Thank you. I want to thank
you for everything.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, aren't you eating slower than
usual? Don't you typically eat a bit
faster?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>What? You're so happy so you'd feel like
it's a waste to even eat it? W-What are
you talking about?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>If you and I are thinking the same thing
we're like a couple! W-What am I saying?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've been grinning the whole time. Did
you like the gift that much?
<PAGE>
Oh, that's good. I'm sure the sweets are
glad to be eaten by someone who enjoys
them so much. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I can't do it. It feels so embarrassing
looking at you straight in the face
right now.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know what? I'll get going. You have
to wake up early again, right? You
should get some sleep.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, it's me, Amir. May I come in?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry for coming by so late. Do
you have a minute?
<PAGE>
Today is Harmony Day, so I brought you
a gift in return for the one you gave me
in winter. Shall we eat it together?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is Harmony Day, so I brought you
a gift in return for the one you gave me
in winter. Shall we eat it together?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. Now let's eat.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you like these sweets, don't
you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh, that's good. Although I had Sanjay's
advice, I did make them myself.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, I was thinking of you while
I made them, so it was fun. I'll do it
the next opportunity I get.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Eating sweets together on Harmony Day
is a lot more embarrassing than I
thought.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>It feels as if I materialized my
feelings for you in the shape of food,
and then confessing my love to you...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But if it's only once a year, I suppose
it's not too bad.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's wrong, <MYNAME>? Why are you
staring at me? What? I eat too cleanly?
<PAGE>
As a prince, so I was expected to have 
proper manners and etiquette. It was
difficult so I cried when I was little.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But now that you're complimenting me
for it, I suppose it was worth learning.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
When I'm with you, I sometimes forget
that I am a prince. I would never have
imagined I could ever think this way.
<PAGE>
To fall in love is a mysterious thing.
Everything I know has been turned on its
head.
<PAGE>
And yet, I feel happy for it. Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I will return now. Be sure to lock your
doors. Good night, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>! Can I come in?!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yoo-hoo, <MYNAME>! Do you know what day
it is? It's Winter Harmony Day!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I made you some chocolate sweets! Let's
eat them together.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Say, <MYNAME>. Do you know what day it
is today? That's right. It's Winter
Harmony Day!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Anyway, sorry to keep you waiting! I
made some chocolate candy. Let's eat 
them together.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. Come on, let's sit at
the table.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Mmmm! Delicious! This is good, if I do
say so myself!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE><MYNAME>, I made them just for you. Can
you give me a compliment?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Haha, thanks, <MYNAME>. I'm sleepy
because I stayed up late making them,
but you just made it all worth it.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Say, <MYNAME>. Thank you so much for
caring about me. I love you.<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
It feels so great when you can say that
to someone you love!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE><MYNAME>, I'll swear on the sweets that
I'll take care of you.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The best thing about Harmony Day for
couples is talking about love and the
sweets.
<PAGE>
For Spring Harmony Day, I got sweets
from you, <MYNAME>. But I still didn't
hear those words of love.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Huh? What was that? You love me? Heh
heh! Me, too.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmm... Eating sweets at this hour will
definitely make me fat.
<PAGE>
Say, <MYNAME>. Do you want to eat my
half? Say ah!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You're being bashful! That's so cute!
I want to take a picture of that and
hang it on the wall<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I had a great time today. Good night,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, good evening. Do you mind if
I come in?!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I'm so glad I found you.
Today is Winter Harmony Day, right? I
brought you some sweets, so let's eat!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I'm here! I just had to see
you today. Well, I already saw you
today, but I wanted to do it again!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Well, I'm kidding about that.<RED>∀</RED>
Today is Winter Harmony Day, right? I
brought you some sweets, so let's eat!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let me get them ready. Let's sit at
the table!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so glad you like them! I don't
always do these things, so I was really
nervous.
<PAGE>
I have plenty so have as many seconds
as you want.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Mmmmm! Delicious! I'm in paradise! I 
love sweets...
<PAGE>
Oh, <MYNAME>. I like you a lot because
you sometimes spoil me, too! I hope
we'll always be together.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
To be honest, I wanted to surprise you
with a magic trick, but I decided
against it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I wanted to be more feminine around
you, <MYNAME>. There's nothing wrong
with that, right?
<PAGE>
Haha. Thanks. This is why I like you so
much, <MYNAME>.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, the present I got from you
in spring was really nice.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>You know what, <MYNAME>? Will you give
me a present for next year's Harmony
Day, too?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Great!<RED>∀</RED> I'll be looking forward
to it!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I think I'll have very nice dreams
tonight. I hope you will too, <MYNAME>.<RED>∀</RED>
Well, good night.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>... You here?

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening... I have a gift for you
for Harmony Day... Do you want to eat?

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here, <MYNAME>. I bought a gift for
Harmony Day... Let's eat together.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks for that back in spring... The
sweets were delicious...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH><MYNAME>... I like you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you happy? Oh... That's good...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I was happy when you gave me a gift in
spring... I was really happy...
<PAGE>
Let's eat it together next year, too...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Um... Thank you...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I have so much fun every day... It's all
thanks to you, <MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
This is my way to say thank you...
Please eat up...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is it good? Oh... That's good...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I thought it would taste better if we
ate it together... That's why I brought
it...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'm so glad you like it... I love seeing
your smile, <MYNAME>. So please... Eat
up...

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you... Let's eat together again
sometime... Well, good night...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, this is Iroha. I'm sorry to
bother you so late at night. May I come
in?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. I haven't talked to you
today yet. How are you doing?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Today is Winter Harmony Day. I have
brought you a gift to thank you for the
one in Spring. Let's eat it together.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Today is Winter Harmony Day. I have
brought you a gift to thank you for the
one in Spring. Let's eat it together.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
O-Oh, I see! Thank you. Now let's
eat.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
T-To tell you the truth, I made this
myself... What do you think?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Is it good? Oh, thank goodness.
<PAGE>
I never made sweets before so I had Hana
teach me. I practiced quite a bit.
<PAGE>
When I see you enjoy it that much, it
was certainly worth the effort. I will
bring you more the next chance I get.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Doing this makes it feel like we are
husband and wife.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I-I'm sorry. I didn't mean anything
strange by it... Well...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I-I just like you very much and I feel
very much at ease around you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Hm? You really feel the same way,
<MYNAME>? T-Thank you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Thank you so much for
everything.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, you are my emotional mainstay.
Much more than you ever thought. I'm
very thankful for that, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
That's why it's not bad even if you want
me to take care of you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I love you more than anyone in
the world. I'm so glad I'm your 
girlfriend, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>P-Please don't look so surprised... Now
I feel embarrassed for having said it.
<PAGE>
I just thought it would be nice to say
my feelings out loud once in a while.
Please accept it with the sweets.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now if you'll excuse me. Good night,
<MYNAME> I will see you tomorrow.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, this is Felicity. Excuse me
for a second!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Today is Winter
Harmony Day! I bought some sweets so
let's enjoy them together.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. I'm so glad to
see you again!
<PAGE>
Today is Winter Harmony Day! I bought
some sweets so let's enjoy them
together.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's eat! Come to the table.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Mmm! This is delicious! This chocolate
dessert is a limited edition! It was
certainly worth waiting in line for!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>If only I had the talent to make sweets
as delicious as this, I would make them
for you every day...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I like you so much I want to do that
for you, <MYNAME>. Tomorrow and the
day after. I will always love you.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is delicious. I feel like I'm in
paradise!
<PAGE>
As long as I have delicious sweets and
my beloved <MYNAME>, I don't need
anything else in the world.<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
Come, <MYNAME>. Say ah! I'll feed them
to you.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
By the way, <MYNAME>. The sweets you
gave me for Spring Harmony Day were
really, really good!
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, I felt just how much of your
love you put in it! And it was really
sweet, too.<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Next year, I bet I can have something
that's even sweeter. I'll be waiting
for it!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, do you love me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>
Haha, I love you, too. I guess we're a
great match.<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
We'll always be a great match! Promise
me!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so sorry for visiting you so late.
I'll go home now. Good night, <MYNAME>!
Hey, <MYNAME>. I'm coming in.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Why didn't you come to my house today?
It's Winter Harmony Day, you know?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You left me no choice but to bring you
the chocolate sweets. We might as well
eat them together.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Look! Today is Winter Harmony Day, so
I brought you some chocolate sweets!
<PAGE>
We might as well eat them together.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's a good obedient answer!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Say, <MYNAME>. Do you feel any different
after eating those sweets?
<PAGE>
Oh, yes. If anyone that doesn't love me
eats those sweets, they would be
transformed into a teddy bear.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>
It seems like you do really like me,
<MYNAME>. I'm so glad you proved it!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. You seem like you really
enjoy them. Do you really love me that
much?
<PAGE>
If you enjoy it that much, I should have
brought you sweets that would make for a
more interesting experiment.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'm kidding! I really am! I'll let you
off easy, for this year at least.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Say, <MYNAME>. Is it good?
<PAGE>
Oh, it is? Looks like the experiment
is a success.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh, it's nothing. Don't worry about it.
Just keep eating.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, by the way, the sweets you gave me
during spring were really good.
<PAGE>
But before I ate them, I cast a spell to
see how much of your love you put into
making it, <MYNAME>.
